SVGPolylineElement.summary: The SVGPolylineElement interface provides access to the properties of polyline elements, as well as methods to manipulate them.

SVGPolylineElementAnimatedPoints.summary: The animatedPoints read-only property of the interface reflects the animated value of the element's {{SVGAttr("points")}} attribute. If the {{SVGAttr("points")}} attribute is not being animated, it contains the same value as the points property.

SVGPolylineElementPoints.summary: The points read-only property of the interface reflects the base (i.e., static) value of the element's {{SVGAttr("points")}} attribute. Modifications via the object are reflected in the {{SVGAttr("points")}} attribute, and vice versa.
